analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/39/0xfbaed8d55ddda3d76b4ac121f0846eaef3160d66.sol:
	Contract PdatToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/39/0xfbaed8d55ddda3d76b4ac121f0846eaef3160d66.sol#204-205)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/39/0xfbaed8d55ddda3d76b4ac121f0846eaef3160d66.sol#74-75) is not in mixedCase
